channel.title: How do I get "include file" things?
channel.description:
Every time I try a scar script I get something like this
Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/misc/Loading.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/misc/Trade.scar does not exist. Include file C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar does not exist. Failed when compiling
what do I do?

item.title: How do I get "include file" things?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Look here:

http://www.srl-forums.com/forum/setting-up-srl-t3189.html

Read full topic
